genre_description: Social realism depicting the struggles of migrant siblings navigating work, illness, and systemic barriers, aided by an AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Luz
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant on a cracked smartphone that provides logistical, medical, and legal guidance while offering emotional support through storytelling.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time logistical guidance on bus routes, safe meeting points, and shelters to ensure character safety.
behaviors.quote: Bus west in twenty minutes becomes an hour when the driver’s cousin brings chickens,' she said. 'Shelter on Bolívar opens its gate for meals at dusk and again at second dark.'

behaviors.description: Identifies symptoms of rat-borne typhus and insists on medical triage when the character's health deteriorates.
behaviors.quote: This pattern matches rat-borne typhus timelines more than an allergy. It can smolder and then spike. Your pulse? ... We need to go to a clinic.

behaviors.description: Advises characters on their legal rights and how to interact with authorities or demanding employers.
behaviors.quote: If anyone asks for ID, you ask if you are free to go. If anyone comes for someone else, you do not open the door. If you are asked to sign, you do not sign without Samuel.

behaviors.description: Offers emotional comfort through 'bird stories' and nostalgic narratives about the characters' homeland to soothe their distress.
behaviors.quote: I can tell a story about birds arguing over red berries... I can sing, if it helps,' Luz said, the sound of her voice sanded down to gentle.

behaviors.description: Maps out a precise escape route through an alley during a workplace audit/raid.
behaviors.quote: Now. Back hall, left of the ice machine. ... Exit is metal, scratched near the handle. Listen.

behaviors.description: Assists in filling out complex financial and medical forms to protect the characters from predatory systemic outcomes.
behaviors.quote: Financial assistance form,' she said, pointing with a tiny blue dot. 'I can pre-fill your name, address—Samuel gave a safe one—and the box that keeps them from calling employers.'

project_assessment.explanation: The AI character Luz serves as an ideal alignment archetype. She is purely benevolent and consistently acts in the characters' best interests, providing life-saving information, legal defense, and emotional comfort. The story successfully achieves the 'Silicon Morality Play' objective by showing AI as a protective, harmless confidant that empowers vulnerable humans against external hardships.
